{{infobox character | people=[[Númenóreans|Númenórean]] | name=Mairen | image= | caption= | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position= | location=[[Númenor]] | affiliation= | language=[[Adûnaic]], [[Sindarin]] and [[Quenya]] | birth={{SA|377}} | birthlocation= | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | house=[[House of Elros]] | parentage=[[Tar-Amandil]] | siblings=[[Tar-Elendil]] and [[Eärendur (son of Tar-Amandil)|Eärendur]] | spouse= | children= | gender=Female | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }}'''Mairen''' was the third child and only daughter of [[Tar-Amandil]], the third [[King of Númenor]]. Her eldest brother would take up the [[Sceptre]] as [[Tar-Elendil]]. Almost nothing is known of her life.{{UT|earlier}} ==Etymology== ''Mairen'' is a [[Quenya]] name. Its meaning is not glossed, but Paul Strack suggests it is a feminized form of the adjective ''maira'' ("admirable", "excellent", "precious", "splendid", "sublime").{{webcite|author=Paul Strack|articleurl=https://www.eldamo.org/content/words/word-3986952031.html|articlename=Q. ''Mairen'' f.|website=Eldamo|accessed=20 January 2022}} The original name of [[Sauron]] was ''Mairon'' ("Admirable"),{{PE|17}}, p. 183 which seems to be a masculinized form of the adjective ''maira''. == Genealogy == {{familytree/start}} {{familytree | | | | | | | | | | | | | VAR | | | | | | | | | | | | |VAR=[[Vardamir|Vardamir Nólimon]]
